thread.title: Larry Wilmore To Milo Yiannopoulus: 'Go F**k Yourself'
thread.title_full: Larry Wilmore To Milo Yiannopoulus: 'Go F**k Yourself'

author: Mary S Papenfuss
title: Larry Wilmore To Milo Yiannopoulus: 'Go F**k Yourself'
text:
Larry Wilmore To Milo Yiannopoulus: 'Go F**k Yourself' Self-proclaimed troll Yiannopoulus had said transgender people have a "psychiatric disorder." By Mary Papenfuss 
Bill Maher might have been willing to give ultra-right wing agitator Milo Yiannopoulus a free pass on â€œ Real Time ,â€ Friday night, but that certainly wasnâ€™t happening on the post-program revisit â€œ Overtime .â€ 
Comedian Larry Wilmore told Yiannopoulus to â€œgo fuck yourselfâ€ twice, once after the white nationalistsâ€™ favorite claimed that transgender people suffer from â€œa psychiatric disorderâ€ and shouldnâ€™t be â€œaround little girls.â€ Yiannopoulus said they are â€œvastly disproportionately involved with sex crimes.â€ â€œI make no apologies for protecting women and children,â€ he added. Maher, astonishingly agreed, saying, â€œthatâ€™s not unreasonable.â€ The host asked panelist and former Republican congressman from Georgia Jack Kingston, â€œwhere do you stand on weirdos peeing?â€ 
After Wilmore and â€œOvertimeâ€ panelist counter-terrorism expert Malcolm Nance attacked Yiannopoulus, Maher asked him why he always had to fight with people. â€œWe were having such a nice time, but you always invite such awful people on your show, theyâ€™re so stupid,â€ he whined to Maher. â€œYou need to start inviting higher-IQ guests.â€ 
Wilmore responded that Nance could â€œtalk circles around your pathetic, douchey little ass.â€ 
The men mostly smiled or chuckled through the parries and Kingston urged Yiannopoulus on, saying, â€œMilo, for it, Brother.â€ 
â€œAre you the real, true face of the alt-right?â€ Nance asked at one point. â€œI thought the Nazis were in there, how did they take you on board?â€ 
Yiannopolous responded that they hate him. â€œThe worst people on the very far left and the very far right all hate me,â€ he added. 
Wilmore quipped, â€œI think youâ€™re leaving out a lot of people.â€ 
Maher advised Yiannopoulus to tone down his rhetoric â€” not just for the show but in general. â€œLook, this is the beginning of your career,â€ he said. â€œPeople are just starting to hate you. You remind me of a young, gay, alive Christopher Hitchens, but you gotta lose that kind of shit.â€ 
Twitter, meanwhile, wasnâ€™t particularly happy about Maherâ€™s gentle treatment of his guest earlier on â€œReal Time,â€ when the two seemed to get on famously and Maher never held Yiannopoulusâ€™ feet to the fire. Others were simply outraged he was invited to begin with. How does Milo Yiannopoulos get off showing up on @billmaher to mock transgender woman while dressed/styled like Coco Chanel on a budget? â€” Mrs. Betty Bowers (@BettyBowers) February 18, 2017 Watching the Real Time clip confirms: @jeremyscahill made the right call. â€” Christopher Hayes (@chrislhayes) February 18, 2017 Milo Yiannopoulos is a self-admitted troll (& proud). I'm disappointed in @billmaher for comparing him to the great Chris Hitchens #RealTime â€” Danielle Muscato (@DanielleMuscato) February 18, 2017 @ColMorrisDavis @RealTimers @billmaher I saw who was on and turned it off. Garbage in garbage out no garbage for me. â€” Constance McAuliffe (@ConniMcA) February 18, 2017 "You can go f**k yourself, alright?" â€“ @larrywilmore keeping it ğŸ’¯ to #MiloYiannopoulos on #RTOvertime .
